site.title: Garrett Koller – Portfolio
site.description: Senior Software Engineer creating positive social change.

hero.name: Garrett Koller
hero.pitch: I am driven to leverage my technical skills to create solutions that not only enhance the lives of individuals but also have a positive impact on society at large by focusing on diversity, accessibility, and sustainability.

values.title: My Values
values.subtitle: These three values shape my work and help me design compelling software.
values.card1Text: I prioritize building technology that serves people responsibly and contributes positively to society.
values.card2Text: I believe in building clear, reliable systems and user experiences that feel effortless.
values.card3Text: I value collaboration, mentoring, and knowledge-sharing as essential parts of sustainable engineering.

skills.title: Skills & Tools
skills.subtitle: With these tools and skills, I implement projects efficiently and creatively.

backend.title: Backend & Architecture
backend.description: Designing robust APIs, orchestrating cloud services, and keeping systems reliable and scalable.

frontend.title: Frontend & UX
frontend.description: Development and support of web projects with modern technologies.

aiML.title: Data & Applied AI
aiML.description: Turning raw data and modern ML tools into usable, real-world features and insights.

projects.title: Selected Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of my work from various fields – from UX/UI Design to Motion Design and Web Development.

dbTrainingRelaunch.shortDescription: Conception and design of a new education platform with optimized course finder and booking process.
dbTrainingRelaunch.challenge: Optimizing user experience and conversion in searching and booking courses.
dbTrainingRelaunch.approach: Development of a user-centered, mobile-optimized design focusing on intuitive navigation and clear booking CTAs.
dbTrainingRelaunch.result: 36% higher conversion and 22% lower bounce rate in the booking process compared to the previous version.

mediaDashboard.shortDescription: Development of an interactive dashboard for real-time analysis of campaign performance across all channels.
mediaDashboard.challenge: Integration of various data sources (GA4, Meta Ads, LinkedIn) into a clear real-time display.
mediaDashboard.approach: Conception and implementation of a modular dashboard with customizable KPI cards and filter functions.
mediaDashboard.result: Reduction of reporting time by 68% and improved decision-making through daily KPI monitoring.

dbExplainerVideos.shortDescription: Series of animated explainer videos that convey complex digitalization projects simply and engagingly.
dbExplainerVideos.challenge: Simplifying technically complex content for a broad audience without technical expertise.
dbExplainerVideos.approach: Development of a visual storytelling concept with a consistent corporate design and clear visual language.
dbExplainerVideos.result: Average 82% view-through rate and positive feedback from executives and project teams.

timeline.title: My Career Path

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and share your personal information when you visit our website.

controller.title: The Controller
controller.description: The party responsible for processing data on this website (the "controller") for the purposes of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other data protection laws applicable in Member states of the European Union and other provisions related to data protection is:

rights.title: Your Rights as a Data Subject
rights.description: You can exercise the following rights at any time using the contact details provided for our data protection officer:

rights.information: Information about your data stored by us and its processing (Art. 15 GDPR)
rights.correction: Correction of incorrect personal data (Art. 16 GDPR)
rights.deletion: Deletion of your data stored by us (Art. 17 GDPR)
rights.restriction: Restriction of data processing, if we are not yet allowed to delete your data due to legal obligations (Art. 18 GDPR)
rights.objection: Objection to the processing of your data by us (Art. 21 GDPR)
rights.portability: Data portability, provided you have consented to data processing or have concluded a contract with us (Art. 20 GDPR)

rights.revoke: If you have given us consent, you can revoke it at any time with effect for the future.
rights.complaint: You can lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority at any time, e.g., with the competent supervisory authority in the federal state of your residence or with the authority responsible for us as the controller.

collection.title: Collection of General Information When Visiting Our Website
collection.description: When you access our website, i.e., if you do not register or otherwise submit information, information of a general nature is automatically collected. This information (server log files) includes, for example, the type of web browser, the operating system used, the domain name of your internet service provider, your IP address, and similar data.

purpose.title: Nature and Purpose of Processing:
purpose.description: When you access our website, i.e., if you do not register or otherwise submit information, information of a general nature is automatically collected. This information (server log files) includes, for example, the type of web browser, the operating system used, the domain name of your internet service provider, your IP address, and similar data.

items.description: This data is processed, in particular, for the following purposes:
items.connection: Ensuring a problem-free connection to the website,
items.smoothness: Ensuring smooth use of our website,
items.security: Evaluating system security and stability, and

purpose.conclusion: We do not use your data to draw conclusions about your person. Information of this kind may be statistically analyzed by us in an anonymized form to optimize our website and the underlying technology.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis and Legitimate Interest:
legalBasis.description: Processing is carried out in accordance with Art. 6 (1) (f) GDPR on the basis of our legitimate interest in improving the stability and functionality of our website.

recipients.title: Recipients:
recipients.description: Recipients of the data may be technical service providers who act as processors for the operation and maintenance of our website.

storagePeriod.title: Storage Period:
storagePeriod.description: The data is deleted as soon as it is no longer required for the purpose of its collection. This is generally the case for data used to provide the website when the respective session has ended.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: This website may use cookies. For detailed information on cookies and your setting options, please consult our Cookie Policy (if available) or the cookie settings on our website.

changes.title: Changes to Our Privacy Policy
changes.description: We reserve the right to adapt this privacy policy so that it always complies with current legal requirements or to implement changes to our services in the privacy policy, e.g., when introducing new services. The new privacy policy will then apply to your next visit.

questions.title: Questions to the Data Protection Officer
questions.description: If you have any questions about data protection, please send us an email or contact the person responsible for data protection in our organization directly.
